name: Malenia, Blade of Miquella
description: Malenia is a demigod and twin sister to Miquella, known for her unmatched swordsmanship and the Scarlet Rot affliction.

name: Maliketh, the Black Blade
description: Maliketh serves as the guardian of Destined Death and wields the power of the Black Blade, embodying the shadow of the Golden Order.

name: Starscourge Radahn
description: Radahn, a demigod and master of gravitational magic, is known for halting the stars and his colossal stature.

name: Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon
description: Rennala is the head of the Carian Royal Family and a master sorceress, residing within the Academy of Raya Lucaria.

name: Morgott, the Omen King
description: Morgott is a demigod shunned due to his Omen heritage, guarding the Erdtree with fierce determination.

name: Mohg, Lord of Blood
description: Mohg is a demigod who commands the power of blood and seeks to establish his own dynasty.

name: Godfrey, First Elden Lord
description: Godfrey was the first Elden Lord and a formidable warrior, now returning to challenge the Tarnished.

name: Godrick the Grafted
description: Godrick is a demigod who grafts the limbs of his foes onto himself to gain power, ruling over Stormveil Castle.

name: Dragonlord Placidusax
description: Placidusax is an ancient dragonlord awaiting the return of his god, embodying the power of storms.

name: Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy
description: Rykard is a demigod who merged with the God-Devouring Serpent, seeking greater power through blasphemy.

name: Fire Giant
description: The Fire Giant is the last of his kind, guarding the Flame of Ruin with his massive strength.

name: Lichdragon Fortissax
description: Fortissax is an ancient dragon corrupted by death, wielding powerful lightning attacks.

name: Commander Niall
description: Commander Niall is a veteran soldier who utilizes frost and lightning attacks, commanding spectral knights.
